contact.title: Get in Touch!
contact.description: If you want to get in touch with me, you can send me an email or follow me on my social networks.

intro.name: Juan Francisco Lopez
intro.description: Software developer experienced in JavaScript, React, Python, and Java, specializing in designing intuitive applications. Skilled at solving complex problems, backed by 3 years in customer service. Excellent communication and teamwork skills, focused on efficient solutions and technical collaboration.

items.title: Ecommerce
items.description: An ecommerce application that allows users to experience quick and easy shopping, adding products and making payments through PayPal. It also features a product rating section.

items.title: Therapy Time
items.description: Therapy Time is a web application designed to streamline scheduling, communication, and patient management for therapists and their clients. Built with cutting-edge technologies, it offers a secure and convenient platform.

description: Created and maintained intuitive web panels using Genexus and Descartes, automating processes and generating detailed reports to optimize operations.
Managed CRUD operations, improving data integrity and accuracy, developing skills in efficient information management.
Handled collections and payments, ensuring accurate and timely transactions.
Provided personalized support to clients in payments and billing, enhancing their experience.
Maintained precise financial records, guaranteeing accounting integrity.
Professionally interacted with clients, resolving doubts and managing requests with empathy, enhancing their experience.
Implemented Excel solutions for reservation control and audits, optimizing organization.
Quickly resolved technical issues in the reservation system, minimizing downtime.
Conducted sales via web and calls, employing persuasion techniques to meet objectives.
